module.name: mqttmessages

element.name: TMQTTMessage.Tokens
element.short: The individual tokens that make up the message
element.descr: Set the topic string and then read Tokens to parse the topic string into individual tokens

element.name: TMQTTMessage.QOS
element.short: The QoS level of the message

element.name: TMQTTMessage.Retain
element.short: Whether or not the server should retain the message

element.name: TMQTTMessage.Clone
element.short: Creates an identical copy of the message

element.name: TMQTTMessageList.Clear
element.short: Clears the list and frees all messages stored in it

element.name: TMQTTMessageList.New
element.short: Creates a new message and adds it to the list

element.name: TMQTTMessageList.Update
element.short: Adds the message to the list, deleting any existing message with the same MQTT topic name
element.descr: Update is used to update the list of retained messages ensuring there are no duplicates

element.name: TMQTTMessage.ClientID
element.short: The ClientID that sent this retained message. Only used for display purposes.

element.name: TMQTTMessageList.Find
element.short: Finds a message by Topic, Data, QOS and Retain fields.

element.name: TMQTTMessageList.Add
element.short: Adds a message to the message list without checking for duplicates

element.name: TMQTTMessageList.Delete
element.short: Deletes the message from the list but does not destroy it

element.name: TMQTTMessageList.Remove
element.short: Removes the message from the list but does not destroy it

module.short: Message class and a message list class
